content: k1 k2tog knit diagonal stitch * repeat around to round 2 k last stitch k1 6 sts decreased one stitch round 3 k1 p1 decreased before each diagonal stitch marker round 4 k stays the same papa bear only repeat rnds 1-4 once more round 2 baby and papa bear repeat round 1 section 1 k1 sl1wyif repeat to two sts before papa and baby knit in round until hat measures 5 6 from cast on edge stitch that runs diagonally k1 rt crown decrease section section 2 p1 knit to one stitch before the stitch papa only that runs diagonally rt round 1 k10 k2tog section 3 p1 k1 repeat to two sts before the even rnds 2-18 knit stitch that runs diagonally p1 rt round 3 k9 k2tog repeat these three sections once more continue to round 5 k8 k2tog move bor marker to after last rt as established 0 round 7 k7 k2tog sts decreased baby and papa round 3 round 1 9 k6 k2tog same as decrease round 1 6 sts decreased even rnds 2 10 -10 18 knit round 4 round 3 11 k5 k2tog section 1 k1 sl1wyif repeat to one stitch before round 5 13 k4 k2tog stitch that runs diagonally rt round 7 15 k3 k2tog section 2 p1 knit to one stitch before stitch that round 9 17 k2 k2tog round 11 19 k1 k2tog runs diagonally rt round 12 20 k2tog * section 3 p1 k1 repeat to one stitch before the finishing cut the yarn leaving about 6 and weave stitch that runs diagonally rt in all ends repeat these three sections once more continue to move bor marker to after last rt as established 0 baby bear ears sts decreased repeat decrease rnds 1-4 four more times then make 2 repeat decrease rnds 1 and 2 once 31 stitches cast on 20 stitches using long tail method leave a remain 12 tail for sewing on ears row 1 3 5 7 purl round 23 k2tog k2tog k1 to last 6 sts k2tog row 2 knit k2tog k2 18 stitches remain row 4 k1 k2tog k2 to last 3 sts k2tog k1 round 24 k2tog k1 to last two sts k2tog 12 stitches row 6 k2tog 3 times k3tog k2tog 3 times remain row 8 k2tog sl1 k2tog psso k2tog finishing cut the yarn leaving about 6 and draw round 9 p3tog through remaining sts weave in all ends cut yarn leaving about 6 and draw it through the last stitch and weave this end in sew ears to each side of hat 8 row from center weave in ends thank you for participating in our project ~ elizabeth
